items.title: Illinois research takes center stage at TRB Annual Meeting
items.excerpt: University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign faculty, staff and students delivered nearly 80 presentations during the meeting, contributing to workshops, lectern sessions and poster sessions throughout the week.

items.title: Eight Winners Selected for the TRB Airport Cooperative Research Program Graduate Research Awards
items.source: National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine
items.excerpt: Congratulations Johann Cardenas! His research project titled 'Mechanistic Overload Permitting Approach for Flexible Airfield Pavements via Deterministic Damage Factors' makes him an ACRP Graduate Research Award winner.

items.title: 2025 IDOT-ICT Research Showcase highlights innovation and collaborations
items.excerpt: Illinois Center for Transportation and Illinois Department of Transportation hosted the IDOT-ICT Research Showcase on Wednesday, October 8, in Springfield, celebrating another year of partnership and progress in transportation research.

items.title: Leading the charge: Preparing pavements for commercial electric trucks
items.excerpt: Commercial electric trucks promise to bring cost savings from lower fuel consumption as well as environmental benefits. But how may their heavier loads impact pavement?.

items.title: A Peruvian's Journey of Growth and Discovery - Johann Cardenas - Peru 2021
items.excerpt: Johann Cardenas, Fulbright Foreign Student Program Fellow from Peru, shares his journey during his time in the United States.

items.title: Showcasing Illinois innovation at Transportation Research Board's annual meeting
items.excerpt: TRB presentation highlights from the Illinois Center for Transportation, featuring research presentations and contributions from ICT researchers at the 2025 Transportation Research Board Annual Meeting

items.title: TRB 2024 Presentation List
items.excerpt: TRB presentation highlights from the Illinois Center for Transportation, featuring research presentations and contributions from ICT researchers at the 2024 Transportation Research Board Annual Meeting.

items.title: ICT, FAA harness AI to take airport pavements to new heights
items.excerpt: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering researchers visited the Federal Aviation Administration's William J. Hughes Technical Center in Atlantic City, New Jersey.
